document.full_text: for the first time in a century, buffalo from the nation's last purebred herd will be able to roam from yellowstone national park into parts of montana without facing capture and likely slaughter, based on a government agreement approved on tuesday.
document.title: deal struck to let yellowstone buffalo roam in montana
lines_and_colors: for the first time in a century, buffalo from the nation's last purebred herd will be able to roam from yellowstone national park into parts of montana without facing capture and likely slaughter, based on a government agreement approved on tuesday.
